She noted that local jurisdictions already have control over police services and operate their departments differently, even though they are all upholding the same law. You only realign programs that you are comfortable with some variation in level of services... and where you think there's enough local accountability to make sure the program is run right, she said.`` If you are not,... it's probably a program best administered and controlled at the state level.''
